title: concise, domain-focused bibliography pipeline specification for the Mathematics-focused project. Produce /outputs/bibliography_system.md describing taxonomy levels, file layout, citation workflow, tools/formats (BibTeX), conventions for seeding and updating /outputs/references.bib, and a 10–20 entry seed bibliography with placeholder/seed entries covering algebra, calculus, geometry, probability, statistics, discrete math, and modeling.
mission: Create a concise, domain-focused bibliography pipeline specification for the Mathematics-focused project. Produce /outputs/bibliography_system.md describing taxonomy levels, file layout, citation workflow, tools/formats (BibTeX), conventions for seeding and updating /outputs/references.bib, and a 10–20 entry seed bibliography with placeholder/seed entries covering algebra, calculus, geometry, probability, statistics, discrete math, and modeling.
